description:
Our viewers are very astute.
There is an inconsistency in the first part of this video that I know many people will catch, so I might as well come clean about it.
Billy asked Cooper : "Have you ever had sex with a guy?"
Cooper's response: "Um, no."
But Cooper was the lucky guy who got to take Harley's virginity . So what gives?
Well, in a very rare turn of events, this video was actually filmed before Harley Gets Fucked. So what you see in this movie really is Cooper's first time fucking another guy.
Why did I post the videos out of sequence? To be honest, I was so excited about Harley finally taking it up the ass that I just
to get it up on the site.
So that's the reason Cooper appears a little more nervous and inexperienced in this video, where he gets to fuck Billy's ass hard.
So, once they sat down, Billy and Cooper both had questions for each other.
Billy wanted to know how big Cooper's cock is.
Cooper wanted to know how many guys Billy has had sex with.
You know, for being a shy guy, Cooper is an energetic little top!
title: Cooper & Billy
